name: Verify underwriter should able to perform cancellation with short rate cancellation and cancellation premium is calculated properly

testSteps.description:
When underwriter perform cancellation on policy with given details as
| CancelType | CancelReason |
| Pro Rata | Business Sold |
Then policy transaction action should be 'cancellation'
And the transaction premium should be the multiplication of transaction premium and prorate factor

userStory.storyName: Verify underwriter should able to create selected Cancellation type and the same is updated in Billing
